abstract: A surprise gift of fruit on the table would humble Robert Cole, an armourer serving in Borneo in 1943.
description: Reflecting on his service in Borneo during World War II, Robert Cole was impressed by the kindness and warmth of the local people, despite being forced to live through war and poverty. In doing so, they taught Cole about gratitude.
